import React from 'react'; import ReactModal from 'react-modal'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const Footer = () => { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const [date, setDate] = useState(); const [creneau, setCreneau] = useState(); const [heure, setHeure] = useState(); const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; useEffect(() => { ReactModal.setAppElement('body'); }, []); const dateRendezVous = new Date(date).getDay(); console.log(dateRendezVous); if (dateRendezVous === 0) { console.log('Vous avec choisit une mauvaise date') } console.log('creneau', creneau) return (

setDate(e.target.value)}> {dateRendezVous === 6 ? null : }
); }; export default Footer;
